CSS updates

In order to update CSS, you will need to modify the JSON file(s) in _data/. Then, run the jsonToCss.mjs script to update or create new CSS files. For example:

node utils/jsonToCss.mjs

Although it may seem tedius, doing so eliminates the duplicate task of sync'ing CSS files and JSON files. JSON files are used by the templating system to populate information in HTML pages. If you are adding new CSS files, don't forget to add an import statement in css/styles.css.
